alert.note: Alert for Inyo (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 11 at 11:31AM PDT until March 11 at 8:15PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by rain and snowmelt is occurring near the Los Angles Aqueduct. * WHERE...A portion of southeast California, including the following county, Inyo. * WHEN...Until 700 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of creeks, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1025 AM PST, local law enforcement reported flooding near the Los Angles Aqueduct in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Areas west of Highway 395 near the aqueduct. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
